about.title: About Me
about.resume:
I am a software and technology geek with approximately 2 and a half years of experience as a web developer. I have led the areas of database architecture and UI/UX in different projects that have resulted in fully functional commercial products.

My time at the Electrical Engineering Degree along with my professional experience of different scales give me a wide range of tools to solve any challenge with ease, no matter how unique it may be.

education.title: Education
education.title-2: Higher Vocational Training in Web Applications Development

project-1.title: Ruby ERP
project-1.resume: Enterprise software for a swine production company, with functionalities such as inventory management (IMS), automatic ordering of scarce supplies, tracking and management of livestock batches, receipt and tracking of electronic invoicing, payroll payment, etc.
project-1.modal-content:
Ruby ERP


Enterprise software for a swine production company. The program includes the following functionalities:

  • Tracking of livestock batches at different stages of growth (weight, feed consumption, mortality, cost, profit, etc.).
  • Control of inventory entries and exits (feed, medicines, supplies).
  • Receipt of electronic invoices from customers and suppliers.
  • Estimated calculation of feed needed for the following week, and automatic ordering from the supplier.
  • Payroll calculation and automatic SMS notification to workers.

Technical parameters:

  • Integration of Google Workspace to receive and process email information
  • Integration of API for SMS sending
  • Service worker for offline application access

project-2.title: Codepen Portfolio
project-2.resume: An online portfolio where I publish different web designs.
project-2.modal-content:
Codepen Portfolio


An online portfolio where I publish different web designs. One of my designs have been selected and displayed on their 'challenges' section, on the website. You can visit the Codepen profile page. You can also check my awarded design by clicking here.

  • Tailwind

  • etc...

project-4.title: Scope - Budget
project-4.resume: B2B software for construction project management. The Budget Module includes the creation and management of budgets and their components, as well as an inventory management system, among other features.
project-4.modal-content:
Scope - Budget Module


Main module of a B2B software for managing construction project budgets. Its features include:

  • Creation of budgets, chapters, UPAs, sections, elements, and supplies, linking elements and calculating unit and total costs.
  • Daily agenda automatically generated, including contractors and their scheduled activities.
  • Management of contracts and required documentation, such as policies and guarantees, contracts, renewals, and calculation of withholdings and taxes.
  • Inventory management, including purchase orders for supplies, entries, and exits.
  • Creation of work records, associating labor activities with contractors and tracking project progress in real-time.
  • Special contractor portal to register their workers and receive their unique code for site access.

project-5.title: Scope - Billing
project-5.resume: The billing module of the Scope B2B software manages the entire lifecycle of electronic invoicing for construction projects, from automatic capture and processing of electronic invoices to their payment.
project-5.modal-content:
Scope - Billing Module


Module for managing the lifecycle of electronic invoices, with features such as:

  • Automatic capture and processing of electronic invoices sent via email.
  • Linking invoices with purchase orders and delivery notes.
  • Alerts before invoices expire.
  • Invoice approval from storage (confirming delivery on-site) to treasury (payment authorization).
  • Calculation of taxes and withholdings for invoices, and report generation.

Technical parameters:

  • Integration with Google Workspace to receive and process email information.
  • Custom library written in Google AppScript to interpret XML invoices based on vendor parameters.

project-6.title: Scope - Personnel Entry
project-6.resume: The on-site personnel entry module of the Scope B2B software integrates an application with a QR code scanner to manage the entry and exit of personnel, provide real-time information on the number of people on-site, and keep a record of contractors' and workers' entry and exit times.
project-6.modal-content:
Scope - On-site Personnel Entry Module


Module for on-site personnel entry in the Scope B2B software, including features such as:

  • Recording personnel entry and exit times.
  • Real-time information on workers on-site, inactive, etc.
  • Filters by contractor and personnel occupation.

Technical parameters:

  • QR reader for personnel access to the construction site.
  • Service worker for scanner access without internet, from mobile devices.

project-7.title: Car Rental
project-7.resume: Serverless web application for renting cars developed in React and Firebase. It features a favorites section, details, authentication, reviews, etc.
project-7.modal-content:
Car Rental


Serverless web application for renting cars developed in React and Firebase. It includes sections such as:

  • Catalog.
  • Details.
  • Reviews.
  • Contact.
  • Payments.
  • Favorites.
  • History.
  • Settings.

You can visit the repo by clicking here.

footer:
This site has been built with Vite, renderized with React, and stilyzed with Tailwind.

It's my pleasure to have you here. Stay as long as you please.
